content:
nin priya sahadenmaarotum ninnute nal kaadeesha maarotum koote
orkkaname njangalkkuttullaa-raam mruthare;
nin valamaakkittheertthavare
/thaaleluyyaa - modippikka.

thirusabha makkalkkaayu ninnotettam duakhatthaale
keneetunnevam:
“naathaa! Maamodeesaayaal ni-nne poondor
theenarakam pukeetaathe
/thaaleluyyaa-modikkaname.”

1. Karuna niranjavane! Punaruththaanatthil
ninnute srushtiye nee puthuthaakkeetaname.

2. Ninnil sharanatthaal nidrayilaayu nin്re
varavinu kaattheetum mrutharil kaniyaname.

4. Vannavanaam varuvonum mruthar thannuyirum
sthuthanennu shareeraathmaakkal paataname.
